name: Crawlcode
tagline: Take part in writing crawls where you shape the story. Save the number of words you've written in writing challenges. Fight against wordwar bots.
body:
#Welcome to CrawlCode
##The number one database of coded word crawls, word bots, and word challenges. 
###Also, the only one. 

Here, Crawls taken from Nanowrimo.org are turned into coded JavaScript guides. Through different decisions, you end up on different paths. The story is yours to make, and ultimately, yours to decide... 
Alongside the crawls, we have challenges. Write three percent of your current word count for a story, or race against a bot to train your writing speed! You can log in to save the amount of words written, or go anonymous. 

> Take part in writing crawls where you shape the story. Save the number of words you've written in writing challenges. Fight against wordwar bots to dominate writing ~Fez
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
